name: Juan Lopez - 2022 Edicion Regional Hat-Trick Exclusivo Qatar
additionalNotes: Selección Especial is a vitola that was incorporated into the brand’s vitolario to commemorate its 150 years and 30 anniversaries of the international network of the La Casa del Habano franchise. Selección Especial consists of 25 Habanos of unique dimensions and a pleasant smoke. All its vitolario presents a consistent flavour and is composed of vitolas made Totally by Hand with Long Tripe.
